    • Class Congrats extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • n

          javax.swing.JTextField n
          A JTextField for the user to enter their name.

        • score

          int score
          An int to represent the score that the user achieved.

        • index

          int index
          An int to represent the user's place in the top ten high scores.

        • difficulty

          java.lang.String difficulty
          A String to represent the user's level of difficulty.

        • frame

          Window frame
          A Window to represent the user's level of difficulty.

        • scoreList

          ScoreList scoreList
          A ScoreList instance that creates a new ScoreList for storing the user's high score.

        • background

          java.awt.Image background
          An Image that will represent the background of this panel.

        • c

          javax.swing.JLabel c
          A JLabel to say "Congratulations".

        • m

          javax.swing.JLabel m
          A JLabel to say "You got a high score!".

        • a

          javax.swing.JLabel a
          A JLabel to say "Enter your name: ".

        • s

          javax.swing.JButton s
          A JButton to let the user submit their score.

        • e

          javax.swing.JButton e
          A JButton to let the user exit without submitting score.

    • Class Game extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • frame

          Window frame
          This Window object is used to access methods in the Window class.

        • a

          Avatar a
          The Avatar pointer

        • p

          java.util.ArrayList<E> p
          The Platform pointer

        • i

          java.util.ArrayList<E> i
          The Item pointer

        • m

          java.util.ArrayList<E> m
          The Monster pointer

        • AVATAR_DEMENSION

          int AVATAR_DEMENSION
          The width and height of the Avatar

        • PLATFORM_HEIGHT

          int PLATFORM_HEIGHT
          The height of the Platform

        • PLATFORM_WIDTH

          int PLATFORM_WIDTH
          The width of the Platform

        • ITEM_DEMENSION

          int ITEM_DEMENSION
          The width and height of the Item

        • MONSTER_DEMENSION

          int MONSTER_DEMENSION
          The width and height of the Monsters

        • background

          java.awt.Image background
          The background Image.

        • sidebar

          java.awt.Image sidebar
          The image for the sidebar of the game.

        • random

          java.util.Random random
          The Random instance that will be used to determine the next colour for the Platforms, Monster, and even Items.

        • jumped

          boolean jumped
          The boolean variable used to see if the Avatar had mad its jump.

        • gotItem

          boolean gotItem
          The boolean variable used to see if the Avatar had collected an Item.

        • goodLanding

          boolean goodLanding
          The boolean variable used to see if the user lands on the correct platform.

        • nextColour

          java.awt.Color nextColour
          The Color instance that will represent the next colour the user must jump on.

        • scrolled

          boolean scrolled
          The boolean variable that will determind if there is a need to scroll down the screen for the user to jump.

        • pauseButton

          javax.swing.JButton pauseButton
          A JButton that if the user clicks, will pause the game.

        • yesMonster

          boolean yesMonster
          The boolean variable that will determind if a new Monster should be added.

        • yesItem

          boolean yesItem
          The boolean variable that will determind if a new Item should be added.

        • ps

          PauseScreen ps
          The PauseScreen instance which will create a new PauseScreen ready to display at the user's choice.

        • score

          int score
          The int that will represent the user's current score when they play.

        • scoreIncrement

          int scoreIncrement
          The int of how much the score should increase (depending on their level selection from before).

        • scoreLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel scoreLabel
          The JLabel to display the user's current score.

        • level

          javax.swing.JLabel level
          The JLabel to notify the user when they progress to a harder level.

        • add

          boolean add
          The boolean variable that will determind if the score should increase.

        • deathMessage

          java.lang.String deathMessage
          The String that will tell the user why the died.
